PSCT.Base:
2 "Ninja" monsters with different Types
Must first be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by Tributing the above cards. If this card is Special Summoned or flipped face-up: You can banish 1 other "Ninja" or "Ninjitsu Art" card from your hand, GY, or face-up field, then target 1 card on the field; banish it. You can only use this effect of "Yaguramaru the Armor Ninja" once per turn.
